short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Chrome extension that makes taking notes 100 times easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NoteLab won 1st Place at Hack the Education and Beyond 2022 Hackathon!

NoteLab is powerful educational note taking chrome extension that allows users to add text, images, videos, and audio files to their notes with a simple click. Just by right clicking and selecting 'Add Selection to Notes', users will be able to create dynamic, effective, and inspiring educational notes. NoteLab also includes basic text editing functions, allowing users to add and change text the way they want to.

NoteLab is a Chrome Extension made for students by students. What makes NoteLab unique from other Chrome Extensions is:
1. No Ads
2. Usable Offline
3. Can Quickly Make Dynamic Notes
5. Can Add Any Text, Images, Videos, and Audio Files from Chrome
5. Supports Dark/Light Mode
4. Automatic Saving

New Features in the Latest Update:
- Automatic Saving of Notes
- Undo and Redo Button
- Font Style and Font Size Button
- Background Color Button
- Line Divider Button
-  Tooltip for all buttons
